attributes.action: Allow November driving tests to go ahead or Give them priority for December test
attributes.additional_details: I find it unfair that people missing out on driving tests during the second lockdown will then be put at the back of the queue when it comes to rebooking their driving test. They should be aloud to have their tests put into December
attributes.background: Allow the people missing driving tests during lockdown to have full priority and get a driving test for December!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462

The booking of individual tests is an operational matter for individual test centres, not a decision for the Government or House of Commons.
